sentence: Why was the tomato blushing? answer: ...because it saw the salad dressing!
explanation: the process of putting sauce on food
first_new_sentence: She applied a light dressing to the salad.
second_new_sentence: The dressing was made of olive oil and vinegar.

sentence: In the provided joke, the word dressing can mean both the act of putting a sauce on food and a type of clothing or garment. Each new sentence illustrates the two distinct meanings of the word.
